title: Bug 114470[Smoke]Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
OB: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") as the filter value for a table, an error message is thrown.
EB: The software should accept new Date("3/2/2005") as a valid value for the table filter without throwing an error message.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:  
1. Create a datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column.  
2. Insert a table and create a filter based on the datetime column.  
3. In the value field of the filter, input new Date("3/2/2005") as the value.
